004package mkt.model;
005
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import mkt.Model;
008
009/** Exponential average model */
010public class Ea {
011  /**
012   * Constructor.
013   * @return InvModel
014   */
015  public static Model mk () {
016    return new Model(
017      "ME",
018      "Media móvil exponencial",
019      new String[]{"Días", "Banda"},
020      new int[]{Model.DAY_PARAM, Model.PERC_PARAM},
021      (closes, params) -> {
022        int days = (int)(params[0] + 0.4);
023        int daysUp = days + 1;
024        double strip = params[1];
025        double stripUp = 1 + strip;
026        double stripDown = 1 - strip;
027        double[] cls0 = closes[0];
028        int ndates = closes.length;
029        int ncos = cls0.length;
030
031        double[][] allRefs = new double[ndates][ncos];
032
033        boolean[] isSolds = new boolean[ncos];
034        Arrays.fill(isSolds, false);
035        double[] refs = new double[ncos];
036        Arrays.fill(refs, 0);
037        double[] avgs = new double[ncos];
038        Arrays.fill(avgs, 0);
039
040        for (int idate = 0; idate < ndates; ++idate) {
041          double[] closesR = closes[idate];
042
043          for (int ico = 0; ico < ncos; ++ico) {
044            double c = closesR[ico];
045            if (idate < days) {
046              avgs[ico] += c;
047              refs[ico] = c * stripDown;
048            } else if (idate == days) {
049              double avg = avgs[ico] / days;
050              double newAvg = avg + 2 * (c - avg) / daysUp;
051              avgs[ico] = newAvg;
052
053              if (c <= newAvg) {
054                isSolds[ico] = true;
055                refs[ico] = newAvg * stripUp;
056              } else {
057                refs[ico] = newAvg * stripDown;
058              }
059            } else {
060              double rf = refs[ico];
061              double avg = avgs[ico];
062              double newAvg = avg + 2 * (c - avg) / daysUp;
063              avgs[ico] = newAvg;
064
065              if (isSolds[ico]) {
066                if (c > rf) {
067                  isSolds[ico] = false;
068                  refs[ico] = newAvg * stripDown;
069                } else {
070                  double newRf = newAvg * stripUp;
071                  if (newRf < rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
072                  else refs[ico] = rf;
073                }
074              } else {
075                if (c < rf) {
076                  isSolds[ico] = true;
077                  refs[ico] = newAvg * stripUp;
078                } else {
079                  double newRf = newAvg * stripDown;
080                  if (newRf > rf) refs[ico] = newRf;
081                  else refs[ico] = rf;
082                }
083              }
084            }
085          }
086          allRefs[idate] = Arrays.copyOf(refs, ncos);
087        }
088        return allRefs;
089      }
090    );
091  }
092}
